name: Maha Ecology Engineering (P) Ltd.
overview: Maha Ecology Engineering (P) Ltd. came into existence with a vision to meet the growing specifications of clients. The company was established in 2004 and is engaged in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive range of Demineralized Water Plants, Water Softening Plants, Reverse Osmosis System, Sewage Treatment Plants, Water Recycling Plants, Water Filtration System and Water Treatment Plants. These categories comprise some product range, which includes Brackish Water Treatment Plants and many others. Up till now, our company has established a remarkable position for itself by providing reliable solutions to the clients. Moreover, we assemble our range using high grade components that we procure from the authorized and certified vendors of industry. To provide value added solutions to our esteemed clients, we have developed a sophisticated research and development unit at our premises. This department is armed with practiced team of researchers as well as engineers, who help us to stay at par with the prevailing industrial developments.
